channel.title: elixir-diary on learn ▷ play ▷ write
channel.description: Recent content in elixir-diary on learn ▷ play ▷ write

item.title: Day 3 - Mix
item.description: OMG It's over six months and I'm at day 3! Let's mix in some tooling today

item.title: Day 2 - Diving in...
item.description: Since last night I've been playing with some of the data structures of Elixir, mostly lists, tuples and maps. While I'm not new to these data structures, the way Elixir's API is laid out is a little different and took awhile to get used to

item.title: Day 1 - Tabula Rasa
item.description: I did enough exploration the past few days and it's time I clean slate and proceed as someone learning Elixir. Not a Python programmer trying to translate Python idioms into Elixir or a Clojure programmer's view of the language, but starting with a clean slate and learning from zero.

item.title: Day 0 - Unboxing and Exploration
item.description: Let's install this thing and do some explorations. This is a totally random, unplanned, whatever-may-come-into-your-mind post where I just query syntactic constructs and map it with Elixir's. Going to be full of misinformations and bloopers, I assume
